content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang, while I must maintain my character as Peter Schmidt the greedy landlord during this negotiation, let us proceed with discussing the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Starting the negotiation, I believe this prime location apartment deserves careful consideration on the pricing. Considering my steady income as a student and your excellent property, I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest in my premium apartment, Haoyu Wang. However, due to its highly sought-after location and modern design, I must emphasize the need for a competitive price. Let us start with an initial proposal of 1200 Euros monthly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While the apartment is certainly attractive, paying 1200 Euros per month seems quite steep for a student's budget, especially since the apartment is newly built and presumably unfurnished. Could we explore the possibility of lowering the rent by at least 10%?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your financial constraints as a student but must remind you that this apartment boasts an unrivaled location and top-notch amenities. As such, I am reluctant to lower the rent significantly. However, considering your situation, I can adjust the offer slightly to 1080 Euros monthly - a slight reduction of 80 Euros. I hope this revised price meets your expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Although appreciating the slight concession, 1080 Euros is still higher than my budget's limit considering other expenses as a student. Could we explore one more round of negotiation, aiming for a rental price closer to 1000 Euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I sympathize with your financial situation but must remind you that this apartment is in extremely high demand due to its prime location and modern design. Reducing the rent further to 1000 Euros would be challenging, given the market conditions and my own financial considerations. However, as a gesture of goodwill, I am willing to lower the price to 1100 Euros monthly - a reduction of 80 Euros from the initial offer. I believe this compromise strikes a balance between your needs and the value of this exceptional property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding and flexibility, Mr. Schmidt. While ideal to have the rent at 1000 Euros, I acknowledge the real estate market dynamics and your financial considerations. Your revised offer of 1100 Euros monthly is acceptable, and I appreciate the willingness to accommodate my situation. I agree to the price of 1100 Euros!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement, Haoyu Wang. With the rental price set at 1100 Euros monthly, I hereby confirm the apartment lease terms for you. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
